Let me first say that they were very slick with how they cut the sample. They used a singing scene, which is very hard to discern how the actual sound quality is because there is a lot of background noise going on, plus music. You can't REALLY tell if the sound is better with the sample they included. I downloaded a couple rars separately and listened to them. When I did THAT, I was able to watch a scene where there was nothing but talking, and that's when you can tell that the audio is CRAP. Very bassless and tinny sounding in nature. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS VERSION. WAIT FOR ONE WITH BETTER SOUND.

I'm amazed by how dumb the R5 rippers are, I mean, sure, it's a hasty job, and some are glad it gets done either way, but just a little more attention and knowledge about audio wouldn't do much harm in the R5 rippers world. It's just so bad, on average, it looks like they're being ripped by monkeys. How hard can it really be to copy audio from one medium to the other?
